title: I cannot delete audio files from Pixel 2 and I am BEGGING for help!!
content:
I have tried every single suggestion on these help forums and nothing works. I have a Pixel 2 and about 3,000 songs left over from my iPhone days. I never wanted them on my pixel and now can't delete them.  I can't get my google play to connect online where I should supposedly be able to delete all of my files. Finally, I cleared the google music app on my phone but all of the files are still there! 

Every other "hack" idea on here no longer seems to work, or is outdated. 
I want them all gone without having to delete every single one individually, or reboot my phone. 

Please. I'm ready to cry. Make it stop.
